Package algonquin.cst2335.finalproject.Model

Interface FlightDAO

public interface FlightDAO
The FlightDAO interface provides data access methods for interacting with the Flight, Airport, and FlightInfo entities in the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    addAirport(Airport airport)
    Adds an Airport entity to the database.
    long
    addFlight(Flight m)
    Adds a Flight entity to the database.
    void
    deleteFlight(Flight flight)
    Deletes a Flight entity from the database.
    List<FlightInfo>
    getFlightsWithAirports()
    Retrieves a list of FlightInfo entities with associated Airport information from the database.
    List<FlightInfo>
    getFlightsWithAirports(String keyword)
    Retrieves a list of FlightInfo entities with associated Airport information from the database that match the specified keyword.

  • Method Details

    • addFlight

      long addFlight(Flight m)
      Adds a Flight entity to the database.
      Parameters:
      m - The Flight entity to be added.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added Flight.

    • addAirport

      long addAirport(Airport airport)
      Adds an Airport entity to the database.
      Parameters:
      airport - The Airport entity to be added.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added Airport.

    • getFlightsWithAirports

      List<FlightInfo> getFlightsWithAirports()
      Retrieves a list of FlightInfo entities with associated Airport information from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of FlightInfo entities with associated Airport information.

    • getFlightsWithAirports

      List<FlightInfo> getFlightsWithAirports(String keyword)
      Retrieves a list of FlightInfo entities with associated Airport information from the database that match the specified keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to search for in Flight, Airport, and FlightInfo entities.
      Returns:
      A list of FlightInfo entities with associated Airport information that match the specified keyword.

    • deleteFlight

      void deleteFlight(Flight flight)
      Deletes a Flight entity from the database.
      Parameters:
      flight - The Flight entity to be deleted.
